Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Westbound Reroute near Forest Preserve Avenue/Oak Park
ShortDescription: WB 78 Montrose buses are temp. rerouted via Forest Preserve, Oak Park, Irving Park, Harlem and Forest Preserve: near Forest Preserve Avenue/Oak Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Forest Preserve, Oak Park, Irving Park, Harlem, Forest Preserve and into the terminal, due to street blockage near Forest Preserve/Oak Park.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
